ygData.subject: A new thread - Unfinished Items
ygData.msgSnippet: On the hopes of starting a new thread... It was mentioned before, perhaps by Jyzan or someone else that in Beta you could construct instruments from the pieces
ygData.messageBody:
On the hopes of starting a new thread...

It was mentioned before, perhaps by Jyzan or someone else that in Beta
you could construct instruments from the pieces scattered througout the
lands. Yet now it seems that almost every vendor has a piece of bamboo,
some lute strings, or something that we could use if we had the talents.
Is there any use for any of these pieces? Can instruments be made that
are perhaps better than store bought?

Any and all information regarding this interesting pieces would be
apreicated.

-Luini the Bardic Tailor from Innoruk-
